name: Cat's Puzzle /ᐠ｡ꞈ｡ᐟ\
description:
Cat's Puzzle /ᐠ｡ꞈ｡ᐟ\ is a simple slide puzzle game. Move parts of the picture around to solve the cat.

Cat's Puzzle /ᐠ｡ꞈ｡ᐟ\ :
  • is a small cute game about fluffy purring beasts
  • has thirteen adorable cat's characters: one for each puzzle
  • has no-brainer interface: you can easily cat-in and cat-out inside the game
  • our cats can purr /ᐠ｡ꞈ｡ᐟ\
  • features kawaii cats and their life as Steam Achievements
